reviews.review_msg: Bee was super friendly and caring throughout the entire semester. Yes, she didn't release any grades until long after the class was done, and give us little time for the group projects, but she made class interesting and it was super easy to get high marks. Would definitely take a class with her again

Its dec.12th and she hasnt marked a SINGLE thing.

very bubbly but MEGA disorganized. unclear expectations, assignment criteria on canvas never what she says in class... bummer, cause the material is super interesting and she obviously cares.

edit - just got grades back (dec 20) and i'm definitely less mad - still wouldn't take again though.
